        LOOP[loop]

        AL[AppLogic]
        BEGIN[begin]
        UPDATE[update]
        REQ_ATM[requestAtmosphericData]
        REQ_GRD[requestGroundGpsData]

    end

    end

        RTCM[RtcManager]
        BEGIN_RTC[begin]
        GET_TIME[getDateTime]
        COMPARE[compareHsAndMs]
    end

    MAIN --> NI

    REQ_GRD --> SEND
    SEND_ANN --> SEND

    UPDATE --> COMPARE
